concept.definition: A method to estimate due date based on the reported date of the last known menstrual period.
A method to estimate due date by measuring the size of the uterus.

description: Select SNOMED CT code system values and selected local codes from Intermountain Healthcare.
name: HSPC Fetal Estimation Method value set

text.div:
HSPC Fetal Estimation Method value set

Select SNOMED CT code system values and selected local codes from Intermountain Healthcare.

Copyright Statement: TBD

This code system http://hl7.org/fhir/hspc-fetalestimationmethod defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
103241 Last known menstrual periodA method to estimate due date based on the reported date of the last known menstrual period.
205940 Uterine sizeA method to estimate due date by measuring the size of the uterus.
